description: Savor the home-cooked goodness of your family's favorite recipes with Hunt's Tomato Sauce. Taste the difference in pastas, meatballs, and more with Hunt's vine-ripened tomato flavors. Simmered with salt, spices, and natural seasonings, Hunt's sauces add a rich, smooth texture to recipes. No compromise, Hunt's Tomato Sauce is 100% natural, with no artificial preservatives. Hunt's doesn't use sugar, corn syrup, or other sweeteners in its canned tomato sauces. Contains 8 oz of sauce; 20 calories per serving. Hunt's tomatoes are picked at the peak of ripeness, because great tasting meals start with great ingredients.

these little cans have so many uses, for example: Red Butter chop up a large white onion and fry it on a low heat with stick of salted butter, when your onion is just starting to brown add a can of 'Hunt's Tomato Sauce with Roasted Garlic' and continue to fry for a few more minutes to reduce the sauce, actively mixing the oil into the red sauce to get an emulsion. take it off the heat and allow it to cool before putting into a jar and keeping it in the fridge.you can use this as a condiment on bread, as a base for spanish rice or as pizza sauce. it has a strong roasted garlic and carmelized onion flavor that gets trapped in the fats and the tomato flavor gets more concentrated like tomato paste.
